Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r PC1}
library(lme4)
library(emmeans)
library(car)
library(dplyr)

three_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_three.csv')
six_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_six.csv')
twelve_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_twelve.csv')

merged_df <- bind_rows(
  mutate(three_df, df_source = "three"),
  mutate(six_df, df_source = "six"),
  mutate(twelve_df, df_source = "twelve")
) %>%
  arrange(subject)

# Result:
head(merged_df)

# Linear mixed-effects model on DT index
model <- lmer(PC1 ~ age*epoch + (1 | subject), data = merged_df)
summary(model)

# Analysis of variance
anova_results <- Anova(model)
print(anova_results)

# Post hoc pairwise comparisons
emm <- emmeans(model, pairwise ~ age)
print(emm)
```

```{r PC7}
library(lme4)
library(emmeans)
library(car)
library(dplyr)

three_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_three.csv')
six_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_six.csv')
twelve_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_twelve.csv')

merged_df <- bind_rows(
  mutate(three_df, df_source = "three"),
  mutate(six_df, df_source = "six"),
  mutate(twelve_df, df_source = "twelve")
) %>%
  arrange(subject)

# Result:
head(merged_df)

# Linear mixed-effects model on DT index
model <- lmer(PC7 ~ age*epoch + (1 | subject), data = merged_df)
summary(model)

# Analysis of variance
anova_results <- Anova(model)
print(anova_results)

# Post hoc pairwise comparisons
emm <- emmeans(model, pairwise ~ age)
print(emm)

library(ggplot2)

# Obtenir les moyennes marginales pour l'interaction
emm_df <- as.data.frame(emmeans(model, ~ age * epoch))

ggplot(emm_df, aes(x = age, y = emmean, color = epoch, group = epoch)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = emmean - SE, ymax = emmean + SE), width = 0.1) +
  labs(title = "Interaction Epoch x Age on PC8",
       y = "PC8 score",
       x = "Age") +
  theme_minimal()


```
```{r PC8}
library(lme4)
library(emmeans)
library(car)
library(dplyr)

three_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_three.csv')
six_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_six.csv')
twelve_df<-read.csv('/home/ldurieux/devmobeta_grasp/bursts_with_pc_twelve.csv')

merged_df <- bind_rows(
  mutate(three_df, df_source = "three"),
  mutate(six_df, df_source = "six"),
  mutate(twelve_df, df_source = "twelve")
) %>%
  arrange(subject)

# Result:
head(merged_df)

# Linear mixed-effects model on DT index
model <- lmer(PC8 ~ age*epoch + (1 | subject), data = merged_df)
summary(model)

# Analysis of variance
anova_results <- Anova(model)
print(anova_results)

# Post hoc pairwise comparisons
emm <- emmeans(model, pairwise ~ age)
print(emm)

library(ggplot2)

# Obtenir les moyennes marginales pour l'interaction
emm_df <- as.data.frame(emmeans(model, ~ age * epoch))

# Plot avec ggplot
ggplot(emm_df, aes(x = epoch, y = emmean, color = age, group = age)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = emmean - SE, ymax = emmean + SE), width = 0.1) +
  labs(title = "Interaction Age x Epoch sur PC8",
       y = "Estimated marginal mean (PC8)",
       x = "Epoch") +
  theme_minimal()

```
